amendment.description: To provide for treatment of Hawaii as a low-DSH State for purposes of determining a Medicaid DSH allotment for the State for fiscal years 2004 and 2005.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 1061 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 1061 proposed by Senator Baucus for Senator Akaka. (consideration: CR S8495-8486; text: CR S8495) To provide for treatment of Hawaii as a low-DSH State for purposes of determining a Medicaid DSH allotment for the State for fiscal years 2004 and 2005.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1061 proposed by Senator Baucus for Senator Akaka.
